name: Vauban Heirloom Tondo Glyph
description: A glyph that immortalizes Vauban’s legacy.

languages.description: Eine Glyphe, die Vaubans Vermächtnis verewigt.
languages.name: Glyphe: Vauban Heirloom Tondo

languages.description: Un Glyphe qui immortalise l'héritage de Vauban.
languages.name: Glyphe Vauban Héritage Tondo

languages.description: Un glifo che immortala l'eredità di Vauban.
languages.name: Glifo Vauban Heirloom Tondo

languages.description: Un glifo que inmortaliza el legado de Vauban.
languages.name: Glifo Tondo de Vauban Legado

languages.description: 铭记 Vauban 的传承的浮印。
languages.name: Vauban 传家宝圆形浮印

languages.description: Vaubanの武勇伝を伝承するグリフ。

languages.description: Um glifo que imortaliza o legado do Vauban.
languages.name: Glifo: Legado do Vauban (Tondo)

languages.description: Vauban 傳承的浮印永世流傳。
languages.name: Vauban 祖傳圓圖浮印

languages.description: ภาพสัญลักษณ์ที่จารึกตำนานของ Vauban ไว้ตลอดกาล
languages.name: ภาพสัญลักษณ์ Vauban Heirloom Tondo
